alert.note: Alert for Clark; Jackson (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 19 at 11:58PM CDT until July 20 at 12:45AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: The National Weather Service in La Crosse has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Clark County in central Wisconsin... East central Jackson County in west central Wisconsin... * Until 1245 AM CDT. * At 1158 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hatfield, or 8 miles southwest of Neillsville, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Shortville around 1215 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Ballard Road And Pray Avenue, East Fork Campground, The Black River Correctional Center, Highway 95 And 73, Bruce Mound, Lake Arbutus and Seventeen Flowage. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
